title: Fully Remodeled 3 Bedroom Apartment In Edgewater
neighborhood: Edgewater, Uptown, Lincoln Park, Rogers Park, Loyola
posting_body: This 3 bedroom apartment for rent in Edgewater is walking distance from the Thorndale Red/Purple stop, CTA Bus 136, 147, 151 and 36.
Close to the beach, parks, restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, coffee shops and banks.
Easy access to Downtown Chicago, Uptown, Lincoln Park, Rogers Park, Lakeview, Wrigleyville, Andersonville, Evanston, Loyola University and DePaul University!
2nd month rent free for qualified applicants signing a 2 year lease!
Utility package additional $196 covers heat, water, and trash.
Tenants pays electricity and cooking gas separately.
Three bedroom apartments starting at $1335 + $196 utility package
Visit our website at www.5900kenmore.com for more information and similar apartments.
